author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 70-year-old man died after the hut in which he was sleeping caught fire in Ambattur early on Thursday.

Perumal of Perumal Kovil Street was sleeping in the hut on the terrace of his house. His son, Kumar, heard his father calling for help and noticed the hut on fire. He tried to put out the fire, but failed, resulting in Perumal sustaining severe injuries. He was rushed to a private hospital, where he was pronounced dead on arrival, policemen said, adding investigations were on to establish the cause of the fire.
title: Elderly man dies as hut catches fire
